title: Do you listen to the BikeRadar Podcast? We want your feedback!
content:
Do you listen to the BikeRadar Podcast? We want your feedback!

We’re conducting a piece of research to find out how you listen to podcasts across the Immediate Media portfolio – and that includes us here at BikeRadar. (Make sure you check out the excellent podcasts at History Extra, Science Focus, Countryfile, Gardeners’ World, BBC Good Food and Olive, too).

  • Take part in our podcast survey

The survey will take five minutes to complete and we’ll put you in a draw to win one of seven £100 Voucher Express gift cards (UK only), which can be spent at a range of shops, including John Lewis, B&Q, M&S, Ikea and Selfridges. The survey runs until 11:59pm on Sunday 16 May.

If you haven’t already, make sure you subscribe to the BikeRadar Podcast, so you don’t miss an episode. Just hit the buttons below to subscribe via Apple or Spotify.

You can also check out the full back catalogue of episodes on our BikeRadar Podcast archive page. Whether you’re looking for tech deep dives, riding advice or interviews with some of cycling’s biggest names, we’ve got you covered.
author: George Scott
